CustomField.description: The Invoice Line Total. If a Commercial Invoice form is submitted electronically, this value is calculated from it. If the Invoice is submitted outside of the app, the invoice line total value must be provided manually.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Invoice Line Total. If a Commercial Invoice form is submitted electronically, this value is calculated from it. If the Invoice is submitted outside of the app, the invoice line total value must be provided manually.
CustomField.label: Invoice Line Total
